Location.Description: You are in the Treasure Chest, a discreet strip club. You are in a small room off to the side of the building, crammed a little too full of shelves with sex toys, skin flick Blu-rays, DvDs, and video cassettes, lubricants, love dolls packaged tightly inside cardboard boxes, and all other manner of adult pleasureware. All marked up at ridiculous prices, of course. You can't help but grin a little at the so-called 'kinky' stuff you come across here. In the world of magic and witchcraft, you've experienced things that would blow any regular human's mind...
